title.desc: Fichier TEI obtenu à partir du fichier CLAN ali-baptiste-101228-4.cha

note.note: A project-specific code has been created in order to study the phenomen of liaison in French. A full description of this code is available in the documentation file accompanying the corpus.

setting.activity: This recording takes place at the family's home, at Clermont-Ferrand, and more precisely in the kitchen. The mother, the father and their child eat and discuss various topics.

application.desc: Transcription converted with TeiCorpo to TEI_CORPO - Soft: 1.41.07
